2023-04-01.description: verticalGroupBy will be removed. Check out the ProjectV2View#vertical_group_by_fields API as an example for the more capable alternative.
2023-04-01.reason: The ProjectV2View#vertical_group_by API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2View#vertical_group_by_fields API.

2023-04-01.description: sortBy will be removed. Check out the ProjectV2View#sort_by_fields API as an example for the more capable alternative.
2023-04-01.reason: The ProjectV2View#sort_by API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2View#sort_by_fields API.

2023-04-01.description: groupBy will be removed. Check out the ProjectV2View#group_by_fields API as an example for the more capable alternative.
2023-04-01.reason: The ProjectV2View#order_by API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2View#group_by_field API.

2023-01-01.description: visibleFields will be removed. Check out the ProjectV2View#fields API as an example for the more capable alternative.
2023-01-01.reason: The ProjectV2View#visibleFields API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2View#fields API.

2023-01-01.description: TRACKS will be removed. Follow the ProjectV2 guide at https://github.blog/changelog/2022-06-23-the-new-github-issues-june-23rd-update/, to find a suitable replacement.
2023-01-01.reason: The ProjectNext API is deprecated in favour of the more capable ProjectV2 API.

2022-10-01.reason: The fixReason field is being removed. You can still use fixedAt and dismissReason.
PRs are removed from the merge queue for the base branch, the branch argument is now a no-op

2022-10-01.description: packageLabel will be removed. Use normalized packageName field instead.

2022-07-01.reason: PRs are added to the merge queue for the base branch, the branch argument is now a no-op

2021-10-01.description: users will be removed. Use the reactors field instead.
2021-10-01.reason: Reactors can now be mannequins, bots, and organizations.

2021-06-21.reason: DOCKER will be removed from this enum as this type will be migrated to only be used by the Packages REST API.

2021-01-01.description: DRAFT will be removed. Use PullRequest.isDraft instead.
2021-01-01.reason: DRAFT state will be removed from this enum and isDraft should be used instead

2020-10-01.description: timeline will be removed. Use PullRequest.timelineItems instead.
timeline will be removed. Use Issue.timelineItems instead.

2020-01-01.description: user will be removed. Use the assignee field instead.
user will be removed. Use the assignee field instead.

2019-04-01.reason: uploadUrlTemplate is being removed because it is not a standard URL and adds an extra user step.
